uk.ac.ebi.gxa.loader.cache
Class AtlasLoadCache

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.ebi.gxa.loader.cache.AtlasLoadCache

public class AtlasLoadCache
extends Object

A cache of objects that need to be loaded into the Atlas DB. This temporarily stores objects during parsing

Author:
Tony Burdett

Constructor Summary
AtlasLoadCache()
          Creates a new cache for storing objects that are to be loaded into the database.

Constructor Detail

AtlasLoadCache

public AtlasLoadCache()
Creates a new cache for storing objects that are to be loaded into the database.

Method Detail

addExperiment

public void addExperiment(Experiment experiment)
Adds an experiment to the cache of objects to be loaded. Experiments are indexed by accession, so every experiment in the cache should have a unique accession. If an experiment is passed to this method with an accession that is the same as one that has been previously stored, and the experiment is not the same object, then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown

Parameters:
experiment - the experiment to store in the cache.

fetchExperiment

public Experiment fetchExperiment(String accession)
Retrieves an experiment from the load cache with the given accession, if present. If there is no experiment with the given accession, null is returned.

Parameters:
accession - the accession of the experiment to fetch
Returns:
the experiment, if present, or null if there is no experiment with this accession

fetchAllExperiments

public Collection<Experiment> fetchAllExperiments()
Retrieves all stored experiments from this cache.

Returns:
the collection of stored experiments

addAssay

public void addAssay(Assay assay)
Adds an assay to the cache of objects to be loaded. Assays are indexed by accession, so every assay in the cache should have a unique accession. If an assay is passed to this method with an accession that is the same as one that has been previously stored, and the assay is not the same object, then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown

Parameters:
assay - the assay to store in the cache.

fetchAssay

public Assay fetchAssay(String accession)
Retrieves an assay from the load cache with the given accession, if present. If there is no assay with the given accession, null is returned.

Parameters:
accession - the accession of the assay to fetch
Returns:
the assay, if present, or null if there is no assay with this accession

fetchAllAssays

public Collection<Assay> fetchAllAssays()
Retrieves all stored assays from this cache.

Returns:
the collection of stored assays

addSample

public void addSample(Sample sample)
Adds an sample to the cache of objects to be loaded. Samples are indexed by accession, so every sample in the cache should have a unique accession. If an sample is passed to this method with an accession that is the same as one that has been previously stored, and the sample is not the same object, then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown

Parameters:
sample - the sample to store in the cache.

fetchSample

public Sample fetchSample(String accession)
Retrieves an sample from the load cache with the given accession, if present. If there is no sample with the given accession, null is returned.

Parameters:
accession - the accession of the sample to fetch
Returns:
the sample, if present, or null if there is no sample with this accession

fetchAllSamples

public Collection<Sample> fetchAllSamples()
Retrieves all stored samples from this cache.

Returns:
the collection of stored samples

addArrayDesignBundle

public void addArrayDesignBundle(ArrayDesignBundle arrayDesign)
Adds a specially constructed data bundle that ships array design data into the database. Unlike other objects, this does not use the standard atlas object model but instead creates a new data bundle with structures ready to ship to the loading stored procedure.

Parameters:
arrayDesign - the array design "bundle" loader object to store in the cache

fetchArrayDesignBundle

public ArrayDesignBundle fetchArrayDesignBundle(String accession)
Retrieves an array design bundle from the load cache with the given accession, if present. If there is no array design bundle with the given accession, null is returned.

Parameters:
accession - the accession of the sample to fetch
Returns:
the sample, if present, or null if there is no sample with this accession

fetchAllArrayDesignBundles

public Collection<ArrayDesignBundle> fetchAllArrayDesignBundles()
Retrieves all stored array design bundles from this cache.

Returns:
the collection of stored samples

clear

public void clear()
Clears the cache. All objects currently stored in this cache will be removed.
